data.name: Jeff Bezos
data.about: Hi I'm Jeff, an aspiring computer programmer. I'm looking for a microloan to fund my startup.
data.orgAbout: Wild Rydes is an app that offers peer-to-peer ridesharing on unicorns.

data.name: Uncle Sam
data.about: I'm Uncle Sam, an banker and an aspiring enterpreneur.
data.orgAbout: Greenback is a financial technology application that offers tax-evasion services.

data.name: Herlinda
data.about: Hi I'm Herlinda, a farmer from Brazil.
data.orgAbout: I had a low credit score, but now have a job and want to get a loan to buy my family a home.
